content.rendered:
These Tennessee natives kicked off their wedding day with a traditional ceremony at the Cathedral of the Incarnation followed by a classic contemporary wedding reception with us at The Bridge Building.

Molly and Blake first locked eyes back in 2015 at The University of Tennessee. Go Vols! A few years later, Blake proposed at Nama in Knoxville, the spot where they shared their first date.

This pair wanted to focus on top-notch food and drinks for their special day, in addition to making sure their guests had a great time.

When the big day arrived, Molly carried a white floral bouquet with whimsical greenery. Her bridesmaids were dressed in neutral gowns in different styles and rocked similar bouquets.

With help from LMA Designs, Music City Tents, Nashville Lighting & Production, and Mayker Creative, The Bridge Building was ready for celebratory festivities.

The historic building's industrial beams dripped in greenery and Edison bulbs, while tables were set with tall centerpieces and geometric bud vases that filled the space with a contemporary ambiance to match Molly and Blake's desired style.

Since they opted for an evening ceremony, when guests arrived at the reception, they promptly filled their plates and found their seats. Stations were set around the main space with yummy selections, including a build-your-own nachos station, a chicken tender and gourmet french fry station, and a classic salad station.

As guests cleaned their plates and sipped on the couple's signature cocktail, Molly and Blake took to the dance floor. The evening was later topped off with a traditional cake-cutting, garter toss, and lots of dancing!

Before driving away in their getaway Mustang, Molly and Blake were sent off with rose petals.

Scroll on for more classic contemporary wedding details.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: November 23, 2019 
Bride & Groom: Molly and Blake 
Location: The Bridge Building
Guest Count: 275
Colors: Neutrals
Photographer: Rachel Moore Photography
Florist: LMA Designs
Cake: Dessert Designs
Linens & Chairs: Music City Tents
Lounge Furniture: Mayker Creative
Band: Burning Las Vegas
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Lighting: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: Cassidy | IH

excerpt.rendered: A traditional church ceremony followed by a wedding reception at The Bridge Building.
